name: Hamster Watch
description:
A visual novel where 10 hamsters are locked in contention and must battle it out in competitions and voting rounds to win one prize - escape from the cage.   A twisted plot has these poor hamsters under lock down. Enter a game where no hamster is safe and everyone is watched.

Made in Ren'Py

From the mad mind of MrPenguinRox, watch your favorite Hamsters vote out their friends, just for a chance at escaping whatever twisted world they are in.
